sentence.Network_en: Cantabile's dark form was riding before me in the front seat of the squad car.
sentence.Network_cn: 在警车的前座上,坎特拜尔黑色的身影在我的面前不断晃动.

sentence.Network_en: Cantabile youth, as well as and flow, sometimes low, sometimes sonorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 青春如歌, 亦如随波而流, 时而低沉, 时而高亢.

sentence.Network_en: For the first time , Cantabile spoke more mildly to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 坎特拜尔这样和蔼地跟我讲话,这还是头一回.
